text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Huh? What did you say, Nature?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
…It's good to be enthusiastic, but let me offer you a warning. There 
are some real monsters here that feed on that enthusiasm.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: M-monsters?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Th-there's no such thing… right? You're saying that as a metaphor… 
right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry. Yeah—I'm talking about the protagonists of the 
academy. You'll see Teio and McQueen aren't the only shining stars 
here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Everyone here has dreams and the raw skills to see them through. It's 
a hearty full-course feast of protagonists, each with their own rivals!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Dreams, skills… and rivals.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I'm all fired up now! Count me in! I wanna learn more about 
everyone!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
All right, then today's your lucky day! 'Cause I'm gonna teach you 
about some of those so-called monsters! Let's go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nin-nin mode, activate. You two've met Helios and Palmer, right? 
They hype up the crowd with their flashy breakaway styles!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yep, that's all true, but… why all the lurking in the shadows? Why not 
just go up and talk to them?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Reconnaissance is all about being a ninja. With that, my little 
fledglings—on to the next mission! Nin-nin!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Yes, master! Nin-nin!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Those three are known as BNW, and they're always competing for first 
place. I think there've even been races where they all finished in the 
top three.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wow, that's so cool! So hey, do you think I could be called… KSB?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's the cool part?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Umm… Those two seem like they're arguing about something…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yep, business as usual! They haven't debuted just yet, but they really don't want to lose to each other. They're future hot tickets for sure!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Future hot tickets… Wow! Everyone is so different! There really might 
be some formidable "monsters" here.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The truth is, we've barely scratched the surface… Buuut it's already 
late, so let's call it a wrap for today.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Tannhauser, you're so knowledgeable. You've even looked into the 
racers who haven't debuted yet…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
This much is normal. Everyone researches their opponents before a 
race, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You would be one to call that "normal."

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Aha! I found you, Sneakyhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sneakyhauser? …Wait, do you mean me?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong, Turbo? Why do you seem so worked up?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I heard what you're gonna do, Machitan! You're gonna run in that, 
uh… "XC vision" race, aren't you?! With Bourbon and Rice!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
And you're gonna wear your racewear! That's so unfair! I wanna run 
too! Don't leave me out!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Bourbon and Rice?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
It turns out that Bourbon and Rice are scheduled to race tomorrow, so 
we hurry over to the track to do some reconnaissance for our ninja 
master.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Whoooa!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Did you see that just now, Dia?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I definitely did, Kita. Those racers are Rice Shower and Mihono 
Bourbon…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Their running is so powerful… They might even be a match for Teio 
and McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
They do seem pretty monster-like. Is Tannhauser really gonna go up 
against them?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wait, where is Tannhauser anyway?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah—Kita, Sato! Nice timing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Check out this letter! It says, "I'm cheering for you! Do your best!" 
Hehehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Is that from the little girl we met the other day?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yep, yep! It puts a smile on my face to know someone out there is 
pulling for me! All right, I'm gonna give it my AAALL—ack!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Aah! A-are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haha, it's just a nosebleed. I must've gotten too excited. Sniff, sniff… Okay, all good now!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Um… Rice and Bourbon are both really fast. Are you feeling okay 
about the race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, well… I've raced those two a bunch of times already. And I can tell you, they're good! Really good!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
There's no way I can beat them through hard work alone. Just gotta 
hope for a miracle! May the gods give me strength, namu-namu!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Uhh, I'm not sure that's gonna work… But hold on to that spirit and do 
your best!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh… She really said there's "no way" she can win. Now I'm getting 
all worried… Will she be okay tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I know what you mean. I'm a bit worried too. But I think despite what 
she says, she's still determined not to lose.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, let's go cheer her on tomorrow! I get the feeling it's going to 
be a fantastic race.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text:
"Tomorrow's the big day. I'm feeling pretty nervous… But it's 
okay—I've done all I can to prepare. I hope I don't let down the 
people supporting me!"
